text: num̆balāgē paramādhipatigen vū samāva veta hā svargaya veta num̆balā peraṭugāmī vanu. ehi pramāṇaya ahasehi hā maha poḷovehi pramāṇaya meni. allāh hā ohugē dūtayāṇan va viśvāsa kaḷavunaṭa sūdānam karanu læba æta. eya allāhgē anugrahaya vē. ohu abhimata karana ayaṭa eya pirinamayi. tavada allāh atimahat anugrahayen yuktaya
